name: Bondit.meme
description: Advertise your favorite meme coins for free. Only http://Tama.meme (Ronin network) meme coins accepted!

websites.description:
Advertise Your Favorite Coins!
STEP 1: Login with your RONIN address.
STEP 2: Request BONDIT.MEME to check the balance of your chosen coin.
STEP 3: BONDIT.MEME will verify the coin balance within 24 hours.
STEP 4: If you hold the coin during the verification period, you will earn points:
10,000 - 100,000 COINS: 1 POINT
100,000 - 1,000,000 COINS: 2 POINTS
1,000,000+ COINS: 3 POINTS
STEP 5: Use your points to submit a new token or extend the listing time for an existing one.

The service uses ronin address from ronin wallet login, to login to the service. There is no smart contract or any other interaction.
Token balance is fetched by https://api.roninchain.com/rpc
I need verified status so people can login to the website without any fear that it will harm them.
